configuration.runtime_stubs_file.description: The file into which runtime stubs should be written.
configuration.demangle_function_names.description: Demangle functions names passed to the runtime.
configuration.target_regex.description: Regular expression to be matched against the module target. Only targets that match this regex will be instrumented

globals.initial_value.description: The initial value of the global.
globals.initial_value_size.description: The size of the initial value of the global.

call.callee.description: The callee address, or nullptr if an intrinsic.
call.intrinsic_id.description: The intrinsic id, or 0 if not an intrinsic.
call.allocation_info.description: Encoding of the allocation made by the call, if any, or nullptr otherwise.
call.is_definition.description: Flag to indicate calls to definitions.

load.pointer_as.description: The address space of the accessed pointer.
load.base_pointer_info.description: The runtime provided base pointer info.
load.loop_value_range_info.description: The runtime provided loop value range info.
load.value_size.description: The size of the loaded value.
load.value_type_id.description: The type id of the loaded value.
load.atomicity_ordering.description: The atomicity ordering of the load.
load.sync_scope_id.description: The sync scope id of the load.

ptrtoint.pointer.description: Input pointer of the ptr to int.

store.pointer_as.description: The address space of the accessed pointer.
store.base_pointer_info.description: The runtime provided base pointer info.
store.loop_value_range_info.description: The runtime provided loop value range info.
store.value_size.description: The size of the stored value.
store.value_type_id.description: The type id of the stored value.
store.atomicity_ordering.description: The atomicity ordering of the store.
store.sync_scope_id.description: The sync scope id of the store.

icmp.is_ptr_cmp.description: Flag to indicate a pointer compare.
icmp.cmp_predicate_kind.description: Predicate kind of an integer compare.
icmp.lhs.description: Left hand side of an integer compare.
icmp.rhs.description: Right hand side of an integer compare.

call.allocation_info.description: Encoding of the allocation made by the call, if any, or nullptr otherwise.
call.return_value_size.description: The size of the returned value
call.is_definition.description: Flag to indicate calls to definitions.

load.loop_value_range_info.description: The runtime provided loop value range info.

load.sync_scope_id.description: The sync scope id of the load.

ptrtoint.value.description: Result of the ptr to int.

base_pointer_info.base_pointer_kind.description: The base pointer kind (argument, global, instruction, unknown).

loop_value_range.initial_loop_val.description: The value in the first loop iteration.
